name: Mr Shivashankar Pai B

name: Mrs. Jonsi Johnson

awards: The dissertation titled "Association between Bone Mineral Density of lumbar spine and hip with degenerative diseases in South Karnataka population" is being done for the partial fulfillment of the degree of MSc Medical Imaging Technology.
publications: Presented a paper presentation on the topic Artificial Intelligence in Medical Imaging Technology in September 2022 at the 5th National Conference organized by the Society of Radiographers and Radiological Technologists (SORRT) and the National Level Conference of Student Radiological Technologists, Kanyakumari, Tamil Nadu.
Presented a paper presentation on the topic of Radiation Safety and Protection on World Roentgen Day, organized by Jeyasekharan Hospital Academy of Radiological Technology (JHART).
